mapper.insert: insert into servant_detail (sid, atk_1, hp_1, atk_full, hp_full, atk_90, hp_90, atk_100, hp_100, atk_120, hp_120, six_demention, card, q_hit, a_hit, b_hit, ex_hit, np_hit, np_rate, hit_np, star_rate, death_rate, star_assign, chara, is_human_form, is_ea_effective, is_pigchange_effective, create_time) values (#{sid}, #{atk1}, #{hp1}, #{atkFull}, #{hpFull}, #{atk90}, #{hp90}, #{atk100}, #{hp90}, #{atk120}, #{hp120}, #{sixDemention}, #{card}, #{qHit}, #{aHit}, #{bHit}, #{exHit}, #{npHit}, #{npRate}, #{hitNp}, #{starRate}, #{deathRate}, #{starAssign}, #{chara}, #{isHumanForm}, #{isEaEffective}, #{isPigchangeEffective}, #{createTime})
mapper.update:
update servant_detail
atk_1 = #{atk1},
hp_1 = #{hp1},
atk_full = #{atkFull},
hp_full = #{hpFull},
atk_90 = #{atk90},
hp_90 = #{hp90},
atk_100 = #{atk100},
hp_100 = #{hp100},
atk_120 = #{atk120},
hp_120 = #{hp120},
six_demention = #{sixDemention},
card = #{card},
q_hit = #{qHit},
a_hit = #{aHit},
b_hit = #{bHit},
np_hit = #{npHit},
np_rate = #{npRate},
hit_np = #{hitNp},
star_rate = #{starRate},
star_assign = #{starAssign},
chara = #{chara},
is_human_form = #{isHumanForm},
is_ea_effective = #{isEaEffective},
is_pigchange_effective = #{isPigchangeEffective},
create_time = #{createTime}
where sid = #{sid}
